results.content: Course is good, and Andrew does an excellent job. I also wanted more production like infra set up (like private subnets) from the course

results.content: Decent overview of AWS deployment. Some things could have been better and kept up to date. I had to do some research and make minor tweaks to ruby app in order for it to load static files properly (which it needs to save, update, delete input to db). Instructor doesn't seem to be responsive. Missing audio in one section (44). Other than that I learned quite a bit.

Instructor doesn't seem to be responsive. Missing audio in one section (44). Other than that I learned quite a bit.

results.content: Insightful very straightforward helped alot gained me new knowledge
results.content_html: Insightful very straightforward helped alot gained me new knowledge

results.content: Excellent content. Instructor did a solid job of breaking down each building block of a deployment pipeline. Also, great job to start with building an instance and getting that working as a first step. That helped me debug (several) issues that I had with my instance configuration and setup.
results.content_html: Excellent content. Instructor did a solid job of breaking down each building block of a deployment pipeline. Also, great job to start with building an instance and getting that working as a first step. That helped me debug (several) issues that I had with my instance configuration and setup.

results.content: No explanation for various choices made through the course, or what they mean in an enterprise setting. Overall useful enough, but too many shortcuts and a severe lack of explanation.

response.content: Hi Emirjon, Thanks for the feedback. Please consider that I designed this course for startups or for those looking to migrate from simple hosts such as Digital Ocean, Linode or Heroku to AWS. The course content does not take shortcuts as it goes through all steps end to end. This is a "fast-track" course meaning I take you through the steps as quickly as possible to get you working in production. I am planning to add additional content to this course, but I don't think I will add enterprise content as its not the goal of the course.
response.content_html: Hi Emirjon, Thanks for the feedback. Please consider that I designed this course for startups or for those looking to migrate from simple hosts such as Digital Ocean, Linode or Heroku to AWS. The course content does not take shortcuts as it goes through all steps end to end. This is a "fast-track" course meaning I take you through the steps as quickly as possible to get you working in production. I am planning to add additional content to this course, but I don't think I will add enterprise content as its not the goal of the course.

results.content: Excellent course with very detailed, step by step instructions for each stage.

results.content:
Excellent course!  I really enjoyed the short and to-the-point videos.  This course has filled in a lot of knowledge gaps I had after doing the traditional AWS Certification preparation courses.  

I've benefited from seeing the real world application of all the services and how they fit together in a start up environment.  I'm now much better prepared for my exam.
results.content_html:
